rna_library.parser.get_motifs(sequence: str, connections: List[int], start: int) → Union[Helix, SingleStrand]

Helper method

rna_library.parser.parse_to_motifs(structure: str, sequence: str) → Motif

Method takes a structure sequence pair and returns a root Motif() with a complete associated graph.

Parameters

  • structure (str) – a valid dot-bracket structure

  • sequence (str) – the corresponding sequence composed of the alphabet [ACGUTNB]

Returns

motif

Return type

Motif
